notesStmt.note: Folio 1v: an account of the translation, printed by the London Society for the Promotion of Christianity among the Jews.Folio 2v: an English description of the manuscript, a paste-down, with four seals.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The four Gospels in the Hebrew translation.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Square script, punctuated, of the 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Gospels in Hebrew. Translated by Tho. Yeats. Mus. Brit. Presented by Mrs E. Gravel. 11, 659. Plut. COXLIII.D.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Esther Gravell, sister of the translator: presented this manuscript to the British Museum on his request on 4 November 1839: inscribed with her name on folio 2v.
